title: "Full title"
author: "Insert author name here"
date: "Insert date here"
output:
  word_document: 
   reference_docx: template_skeleton.docx

# install flextable
```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(flextable)
doc_data <- c("Date:", "Insert date", "Status:","Internal/Draft/Final/Revised", "Checked/Approved", "Insert name")
doc_data2 <- c("Author:","Insert author", "Version:", "Number", "Short title", "Title")

Document <- data.frame(cbind(doc_data, doc_data2))

```

## Document information
```{r}
flextable(Document)
```
